file_insights.context: Standard Python requirements file with pinned versions

patterns_discovered.pattern: Semantic versioning with minimum version constraints

patterns_discovered.description: Task completed successfully on first attempt

gotchas_discovered.gotcha: No specific version pinning for cryptography
gotchas_discovered.details: Using >= allows any version 41.0.0 and above, which could introduce breaking changes in minor/patch versions

approach_outcome.description: Successfully added cryptography package dependency to Python requirements with version constraint >=41.0.0

recommendations.rationale: Using ==41.0.0 or ~=41.0.0 would prevent unexpected breaking changes from newer cryptography versions

recommendations.recommendation: Verify cryptography dependency is actually used
recommendations.rationale: Ensure the added dependency aligns with actual codebase requirements and is not unused

recommendations.recommendation: Update lock file if using pip-compile or poetry
recommendations.rationale: Generate lock files to ensure reproducible dependency resolution across environments
